maniSchedule.title: Departure from Ahmedabad
maniSchedule.description: Departure from Ahmedabad is scheduled from Ahmedabad Junction in Ahmedabad Jammu Tawi Express. It takes almost 28 hours to reach Pathankot station.

maniSchedule.title: Arrival at Pathankot & Depart to Kasol
maniSchedule.description: The morning will be pleasant and picturesque as you will be in Punjab by then. The endless wheat fields and striking cold will make you feel differently energised. The train will change the direction at Firozpur Jn and you might reach Pathankot Jn by 3:00 PM if the train is running on time.

maniSchedule.title: Day for Acclimatisation & Kasol Visit
maniSchedule.description: The Campsite Manager will meet you for a briefing. He will introduce you with the team members. The day is planned for acclimatisation, group activities & Kasol Market Visit. You will enjoy a lot of team building games and activities with our senior instructors.Then we depart for Manikaran. Manikaran is a pilgrimage centre for Hindus and Sikhs. The Hindus believe that Manu recreated human life in Manikaran after the flood, making it a sacred area. It has many temples and a Gurudwara. The area is well known for its hot springs and its beautiful landscape.

maniSchedule.title: Visit Manikaran Gurudwara & Travel to Manali
maniSchedule.description: Drive to Manali to prepare for the trek!

maniSchedule.title: Trek to Advanced Basecamp
maniSchedule.description: From the BaseCamp, the trekking will start. After trekking for a few hours, you will reach the advanced base camp where you will be allotted tents/Local Home. It will also include campfire wherein you can sing, dance, share your stories, or just listen! This will give you time talk to fellow trekkers and make bonds.

maniSchedule.title: Trek to Snow Point & River Rafting
maniSchedule.description: Trek to Snow Point. Snow Games & Snow Slides. After Playing in Snow Back to Naggar Campsite. River Rafting & Garba Party

maniSchedule.title: Day for Manali Sightseeing & Paragliding
maniSchedule.description: This day is kept free for participants to have a spending time at seeing the most amazing attractions of the town. This day is a cluster of various activities like paragliding and Manali sightseeing. The day ends at Manali campsite following the dinner. It is recommended to all the participants to have an experience of adventurous activities. If not, there are many other options to spend at Manali while wandering through the local market, temples, waterfalls and much more.

maniSchedule.title: Return Journey towards Ahmedabad
maniSchedule.description: Ahmedabad Jammu Tawi Train arrives at 10:00 AM and the camp disperse for hometown. It would take approximately 27 hours to reach Ahmedabad station at 01:40 PM on the next day.

maniSchedule.title: Arrival at Ahmedabad
maniSchedule.description: The camp returns at Ahmedabad taking 27 hours approx. Meanwhile, there are many food savours to taste at different stations as suggested by the Camp Leader. The camp dispersed after arriving at Ahmedabad Junction. Time to disperse with a lot of memories and lots of photographs.

maniSchedule.title: Departure from Ahmedabad
maniSchedule.description: The day will be memorable for you as you will spend the day and night on the same train. You can bring books to read or cards or any other games to pass the time. You can also play dumb charades or Antakshari!!. We will be providing you food after you reach the Basecamp in Kasol. So please try to bring food for this day or you can order.

maniSchedule.title: Arrival at Pathankot & Depart to Kasol
maniSchedule.description: After reaching Pathankot, you will be asked to put your luggage into your vehicles and you will get free time to visit the Pathankot Market till 8 PM. Your vehicles will leave from the Pathankot Station Parking at sharp 8:30 PM. We will travel overnight on the roads towards Kasol. The vehicles will take frequent halts during the night for safe and comfortable journey.

The area is well known for its hot springs and its beautiful landscape.

maniSchedule.title: Day for Sightseeing at Amritsar
maniSchedule.description: Amritsar city is a major city in the state Punjab. The camp reaches amritsar in the morning. The day is then meant to explore the city including many attractions. The vehicles will be provided by the organisation to cover the destinations. Wagah Border Parade Ceremony Time: 4 PM to 5 PM. It would be a 3 hours ride from Pathankot to Amritsar. Whole day will be spent on different attractions of the city. Each destination is worth not to miss. Wagha border at Amritsar is an Indian-Pakistan border. It is suggested to reach the border to acquire a good place to watch the activities at the border. Golden temple, Jallianwala Baugh are also covered.

maniSchedule.title: Return Journey towards Ahmedabad
maniSchedule.description: Ahmedabad Jammu Tawi Train arrives at 10:00 AM and the camp disperse for hometown. It would take approximately 27 hours to reach Ahmedabad station at 01:40 PM on the next day.

The camp dispersed after arriving at Ahmedabad Junction. Time to disperse with a lot of memories and lots of photographs.

maniSchedule.title: Report at Pathankot Station & Start Journey
maniSchedule.description: Departure for Kasol: 08:00 PM Arrival at Kasol: Around 8:00 AM, on next day. We will leave from the Pathankot Station Parking at sharp 8:00 PM. We will travel overnight on the roads towards Kasol. The vehicles will take frequent halts during the night for safe and comfortable journey.

maniSchedule.title: Arrival at Pathankot & Disperse
maniSchedule.description: we will reach Pathankot by 10 AM in the morning & End of the Camp.

maniSchedule.title: Depart from Delhi in the Evening
maniSchedule.description: The journey starts in the evening at 06:00 PM from Majnu ka Tila. This will be an overnight journey in bus. we will reach Kasol campsite after about 14 hours the next day morning

maniSchedule.title: Arrival at Delhi & Disperse
maniSchedule.description: It will take almost 14 hours to reach back to Delhi & the team disperses from here.
